dc:title: Story of a Legacy
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: After receiving $500 in someone's will, explains why the Catholic Worker is not incorporated--the basis of the work is personal responsibility and seeing Christ in everyone who comes for help. Says "Ever to become smaller that is the aim."
